name: Neon Flick Soccer
description:
Simple and addictive gameplay, stunning dribbling Skills & Tricks, 5 different game modes: Arcade, Gravity, Shoots, Penalty and Shootout, improved realistic physics.

You can become ultimate kick football goal master.

Play for free as much as you want, there are no limits on gems and coins.

Unlock more than 20 new beautiful balls and different football fields.

Neon Flick Soccer is easy to play, but challenging to master!

Intuitive Flick (Swipe) control:
Flick(Short) your finger to dribbling
Flick(Long) your finger to shoot the ball
